name: Earth Shield
description: Protects the target with an earthen shield, giving a ${chanceToIgnore}% chance of ignoring spell interruption when damaged and causing attacks to heal the shielded target for ${powerMax}.  This effect can only occur once every few seconds. 6 charges. Lasts 10 min. Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time and only one Elemental Shield can be active on a target at a time.
